page.title: 29A day in Primary Five at Banchory Primary School
page.content:
Games players- 3 and up sardines -In the playground we like to play sardines because it is fun. One person hides and the rest count to 50 or 100 then you all go different ways and then someone finds the person who was hiding he or she hides with them.The

first person to find he or she goes and hides and the rest count.
Holly Eilidh
